text:
Hello Developers,

*Iâ€™m excited to share 2 upcoming changes to the Asset Marketplace effective starting June 1, 2020.*

1. Themes will be available to buy in the Asset Marketplace starting 6/1/20. As a reminder we opened theme submissions to the Marketplace on March 10th. Developers now have an option to submit a theme in their provider account. The updated marketplace requirements can be viewed <https://www.HubSpot.com/e2t/c/*W9dFrLR3rgBCtW99vfXt2ZT4ds0/*W5Nc4B57krrQCW6Y0YMW2vJYl60/5/f18dQhb0S1cr6Xv997VWlMC-1tv59qW5W9w8T2xN5JTW2WkfHz12BGZbW1g7gCt3ffVsBVldqYP7mN0HpW45F6Yz7MQ6d2W9hg74k21NqSFW1FGmm13xRGf-W8dXcnx24PWZGW2k8Bnz58VmHWW2Tb9wC7VtBnVN3ZBr_ngF1hqW4ysvp06jt6vdW10tHFQ8ZJnbYW13C3rP4ytc4tW6Yhzqp22zHf3VdT3493m4KrmW4_Bb9g1hrrrhVTfy2P1-B7cjW8bqWhj3Ft1PjW8H7Hsj7TkR00W5ZF_GV6Nm-cYW1MLfb34TQ77ZW37sJb77PQ4t8W3RyBq46bP9X3W4N5zdc6701rTW18jj-51Y7HpZW5Hh9YW5xVwDxW7nRCCH3L8TJgW6B3lmr7nbknpW8_2RQw8c85pSW42Vw-Y4H31VHW8p6_nx9dBWX7W7rQhWB8SCT0mf3rVTKf02|here>. Not yet a Marketplace provider? Create your free provider account <https://app.HubSpot.com/signup/asset-provider/step/user-info|here>.
2. To keep a high standard of quality in the Marketplace we will be implementing a new process for removing stale assets. Beginning June 1st any asset that has not been downloaded for 180 days will be removed from the Marketplace. If you have any questions please feel free to reach out.
